name: property_inspections_days
title: How many days after Acceptance will you need to access the property for inspections?
label: Access Days
description: This is not a contingency, but it gives you a guaranteed amount of time to complete any desired inspections or walkthroughs of the property.
tips: The standard inspection period is 17 days. Schedule all property inspections and walkthroughs within this timeframe.
small_print: Access to the property must be coordinated with the seller or their agent.

internal.notes: Days allowed for property access and inspections

property_inspections_days.name: property_inspections_days

suggested.hint: Anything more than 25 days may be considered unreasonable by the seller.

property_inspections_days.tooltip: Enter the number of days needed for property access
